title: LPL and LCK intros are so cool. NA and EU should do something similiar.
body: Don't you think ? These chinese and korean players looks so bad ass with these intros.

replies.body: i think they look like complete idiots.
LCKs on-stage trash talk was amazing. I think that was the determining factor for SKT to play Easyhoon/Tom in all 3 games.
